description: Describes one or more Client VPN endpoints in the account.

parameters.name: ClientVpnEndpointIds
parameters.description: The ID of the Client VPN endpoint. (string) ---

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: One or more filters. Filter names and values are case-sensitive. endpoint-id - The ID of the Client VPN endpoint. transport-protocol - The transport protocol ( tcp | udp). (dict) --- A filter name and value pair that is used to return a more specific list of results from a describe operation. Filters can be used to match a set of resources by specific criteria, such as tags, attributes, or IDs. If you specify multiple filters, the filters are joined with an AND, and the request returns only results that match all of the specified filters. For more information, see List and filter using the CLI and API in the Amazon EC2 User Guide. Name (string) --- The name of the filter. Filter names are case-sensitive. Values (list) --- The filter values. Filter values are case-sensitive. If you specify multiple values for a filter, the values are joined with an OR, and the request returns all results that match any of the specified values. (string) ---

nested_items.name: ClientVpnEndpoints
nested_items.description: Information about the Client VPN endpoints.

nested_items.name: ClientVpnEndpointId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Client VPN endpoint.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: A brief description of the endpoint.

nested_items.name: Code
nested_items.description: The state of the Client VPN endpoint. Possible states include:
pending-associate - The Client VPN endpoint has been created but no target networks have been associated. The Client VPN endpoint cannot accept connections.
available - The Client VPN endpoint has been created and a target network has been associated. The Client VPN endpoint can accept connections.
deleting - The Client VPN endpoint is being deleted. The Client VPN endpoint cannot accept connections.
deleted - The Client VPN endpoint has been deleted. The Client VPN endpoint cannot accept connections.

nested_items.name: Message
nested_items.description: A message about the status of the Client VPN endpoint.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The date and time the Client VPN endpoint was created.

nested_items.name: DeletionTime
nested_items.description: The date and time the Client VPN endpoint was deleted, if applicable.

nested_items.name: DnsName
nested_items.description: The DNS name to be used by clients when connecting to the Client VPN endpoint.

nested_items.name: ClientCidrBlock
nested_items.description: The IPv4 address range, in CIDR notation, from which client IP addresses are assigned.

nested_items.name: DnsServers
nested_items.description: Information about the DNS servers to be used for DNS resolution.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: SplitTunnel
nested_items.description: Indicates whether split-tunnel is enabled in the Client VPN endpoint.

nested_items.name: VpnProtocol
nested_items.description: The protocol used by the VPN session.

nested_items.name: TransportProtocol
nested_items.description: The transport protocol used by the Client VPN endpoint.

nested_items.name: VpnPort
nested_items.description: The port number for the Client VPN endpoint.

nested_items.name: AssociatedTargetNetworks
nested_items.description: Information about the associated target networks. A target network is a subnet in a VPC.

nested_items.name: NetworkId
nested_items.description: The ID of the subnet.

nested_items.name: NetworkType
nested_items.description: The target network type.

nested_items.name: ServerCertificateArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the server certificate.

nested_items.name: AuthenticationOptions
nested_items.description: Information about the authentication method used by the Client VPN endpoint.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The authentication type used.

nested_items.name: ActiveDirectory
nested_items.description: Information about the Active Directory, if applicable.

nested_items.name: DirectoryId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Active Directory used for authentication.

nested_items.name: MutualAuthentication
nested_items.description: Information about the authentication certificates, if applicable.

nested_items.name: ClientRootCertificateChain
nested_items.description: The ARN of the client certificate.

nested_items.name: FederatedAuthentication
nested_items.description: Information about the IAM SAML identity provider, if applicable.

nested_items.name: SamlProviderArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM SAML identity provider.

nested_items.name: SelfServiceSamlProviderArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM SAML identity provider for the self-service portal.

nested_items.name: ConnectionLogOptions
nested_items.description: Information about the client connection logging options for the Client VPN endpoint.

nested_items.name: Enabled
nested_items.description: Indicates whether client connection logging is enabled for the Client VPN endpoint.

nested_items.name: CloudwatchLogGroup
nested_items.description: The name of the Amazon CloudWatch Logs log group to which connection logging data is published.

nested_items.name: CloudwatchLogStream
nested_items.description: The name of the Amazon CloudWatch Logs log stream to which connection logging data is published.

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: Any tags assigned to the Client VPN endpoint.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The key of the tag.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value of the tag.

nested_items.name: SecurityGroupIds
nested_items.description: The IDs of the security groups for the target network.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: VpcId
nested_items.description: The ID of the VPC.

nested_items.name: SelfServicePortalUrl
nested_items.description: The URL of the self-service portal.

nested_items.name: ClientConnectOptions
nested_items.description: The options for managing connection authorization for new client connections.

nested_items.name: Enabled
nested_items.description: Indicates whether client connect options are enabled.

nested_items.name: LambdaFunctionArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Lambda function used for connection authorization.

nested_items.name: Code
nested_items.description: The status code.

nested_items.name: Message
nested_items.description: The status message.

nested_items.name: SessionTimeoutHours
nested_items.description: The maximum VPN session duration time in hours.

nested_items.name: ClientLoginBannerOptions
nested_items.description: Options for enabling a customizable text banner that will be displayed on Amazon Web Services provided clients when a VPN session is established.

nested_items.name: Enabled
nested_items.description: Current state of text banner feature.

nested_items.name: BannerText
nested_items.description: Customizable text that will be displayed in a banner on Amazon Web Services provided clients when a VPN session is established. UTF-8 encoded characters only. Maximum of 1400 characters.

nested_items.name: ClientRouteEnforcementOptions
nested_items.description: Client route enforcement is a feature of the Client VPN service that helps enforce administrator defined routes on devices connected through the VPN. T his feature helps improve your security posture by ensuring that network traffic originating from a connected client is not inadvertently sent outside the VPN tunnel.

nested_items.name: Enforced
nested_items.description: Status of the client route enforcement feature, indicating whether Client Route Enforcement is true (enabled) or false (disabled).

nested_items.name: DisconnectOnSessionTimeout
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the client VPN session is disconnected after the maximum sessionTimeoutHours is reached. If true, users are prompted to reconnect client VPN. If false, client VPN attempts to reconnect automatically. The default value is false.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token to use to retrieve the next page of results. This value is null when there are no more results to return.
